data.name: Hero Chest
data.detailed_description:
In a funny role reversal, like a parody on Hero Chest, you take control of a Chest tired of being looted by heroes and determined to get strong enough to drive all the heroes back to their guilds.



For this you will have to create the best way in the dungeon using the special cards, ally with the dungeon monsters, save the chests you find and accumulate the greatest amount of treasure possible, since your attack power is directly proportional to the amount of gold that the chest has.



In this game you can:

- Little time to play???? No problem here you will be able to determine the size/time of your dungeon;
- Create the best path using dungeon cards and special cards;
- Save monsters from the clutches of heroes;
- Make friends with other monsters so that they join your team;



- Save the chests you find, they will help you by trading items or making upgrades;
- Accumulate as much treasure as possible, your strength is directly linked to the amount of gold you have;



- Play with a Chest, evolve and change classes just by changing hats;
- You are free to Explore the dungeon any way you want, find secret passages, and solve puzzles;
- Save the Boss from the clutches of the heroes and try to convince them to be part of your group.
- And much more....



In Hero Chest you will have fun with the combination of Roguelike, Hack Slash and Card Game.
An adventure full of combat and gold!

data.short_description: In a role reversal in Hero Chest, take control of a chest tired of being looted and frighten the heroes back to their guilds! Create your way with the cards, ally with the monsters, save the chests and accumulate gold. Have fun with the perfect combination of Roguelike, Hack Slash and Card Game!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and OS.
